column4: I have a WD external drive that comes from windows, but was lent to a MacOS user who apparently accidentally re-partitioned the drive to HFS.  It now will now mount on windows, but the owner brought it to me, and I find that it does mount on ubuntu.  However, I cannot read anything but the new HFS+ partition.  What tool might I use to examine the deleted partition if that's possible?
the new partition overwrote the old, correct?
Yes - the new partition is the entire drive.
i think you are out of luck
